chapter.name: Delicious Tutorials: Circular Sequencer
chapter.indexinfo: A variation on the standard step sequencer, powered by Javascript
chapter.p: Sequences, shapes and patterns have always been interesting to me, especially in the musical domain. Arranging beats on a circle has a lot of nice properties, not the least of which is that it lets you create "beats within a beat", like in this example. Also, this tutorial is a great way to get started with Javascript in Max.
